item.description:
Difficulty: beginner (flat or gentle hills; but we haven't decided how far we're hiking yet)

There are many trails at Leominster State Forrest, and maps can be picked up at the gate. We can decide on a trail then if we don't figure that out by Sunday night. Personally, 11am Monday works for me...I don't have to work Monday, and I can sleep in! But if we need to go earlier or later, that's okay, too.

 

Please use Richard's directions. (I don't know the exact address, so I can't add a location)

From Route 2, drive South on 31 until you leave Leominster by 100 yards. Parking is on left. From south, take 31 north until just before Leominster. Parking on right.

If you go to the map posted at http://www.mass.gov/dcr/parks/trails/leominster.pdf, the parking area is on the east side of route 31. There are 3 parking areas shown on the east side. It is the middle one. If you zoom in, you will also see that this parking area is between the numbers 4 and 5. As an additional landmark, this parking area is paved, there is a porta potty in it and it overlooks ponds. The P for parking appears to be in the middle of a pond, but it isn't!
item.how_to_find_us: From Route 2, drive South on 31 out of Leominster by 100 yards. Parking is on left. From south, take 31 north until just before Leominster. Parking on right.

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Weekday hikes (Monday Hikes)
